body:
I have been here since when the The Walls servers was like a.wallsmc.com or b.wallsmc.com. (november 2012)

The reason for why i have low stats on my profile is bc all stats were reset the day the update came out.

I used to be in second place in skywars (january 2013) and got VIP+ for be the 3rd on voting for kits (march 2013)
Those were the days :)

Proof: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CyXpsFVNoAg

And i just wondered, how many people have been here since that?

title: Does somebody remember this?

replies.body: I have but I wasn't a major player here at the time.
replies.body_tagged: I have but I wasn't a major player here at the time.

replies.body: I remember this. This was the absolute best game mode there ever was on this server.
replies.body_tagged: I remember this. This was the absolute best game mode there ever was on this server.

replies.body: Those were the days, all gone now :(
